comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
The changes to markdown files and dockerfiles will break our users, because we currently don't have the package named `powershell-6.0.0_beta.1-1.el7.x86_64.rpm`.
The changes to files other than `build.psm1` should be reverted. The package name updates should be done in the next release.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw so your recommendation is that we stage these changes: change build.psm1 so that our next release will have the correct file name, then update all the readme/scripts to use this new filename after the release, correct?
